summary: A young California surfer has to grow up in a hurry when he is thrown into a Peruvian political prison in 1980.
cast: John Robinson|Michael DeLorenzo|Alex Meraz|Johnny Lewis|Grant Bowler|Paul Ramirez|Deborah Kara Unger|Oscar Carrillo|Nick Machado|Renzo Schuller|Gustavo Mayer|Luis Alberto Urrutia|Coco Gutierrez|Corey Browne|Diego Cáceres|Anahí de Cárdenas|Ledesma. Gabriel|Cesar Gabrielli|Rocio Lazaro|David Michie|Ruben Rabasa|Diego Acuna
title: 186 Dollars to Freedom
